TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ManagementQualifierFlavors extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Qualifier flavors that can be used with WMI provider extensions. Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries. The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para saber mais sobre os tipos de qualificador leia as [tipos de qualificador](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96563) tópico no SDK do WMI no MSDN.To learn more about qualifier flavors read the [Qualifier Flavors](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96563) topic in the WMI SDK on MSDN. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir demonstra como usar a enumeração DisableOverride ManagementQualifierFlavors.The following example demonstrates how to use the DisableOverride ManagementQualifierFlavors enumeration. Aqui está sendo aplicada para o qualificador de associação.Here it is being applied to the Association qualifier. ``` [ManagementQualifier("Association", Flavor = ManagementQualifierFlavors.DisableOverride)] public class AssociationSampleBase { [ManagementReference(Type = "UserInfo")] [ManagementKey] public string Configuration; [ManagementReference(Type = "LogInfo")] [ManagementKey] public string Hosting; //additional code omitted ```

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierFlavors Amended = int32(1)

summary.span: The qualifier is not required in the basic class definition and can be moved to the amendment to be localized.

span.span: The qualifier is not required in the basic class definition and can be moved to the amendment to be localized.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierFlavors ClassOnly = int32(4)

summary.span: The qualifier is propagated to instances.

span.span: The qualifier is propagated to instances.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierFlavors DisableOverride = int32(2)

summary.span: The qualifier cannot be overridden in a derived class or instance.

span.span: The qualifier cannot be overridden in a derived class or instance.

summary.span: Note that being able to override a propagated qualifier is the default.

span.span: Note that being able to override a propagated qualifier is the default.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementQualifierFlavors ThisClassOnly = int32(8)

summary.span: The qualifier is not propagated to derived classes.

span.span: The qualifier is not propagated to derived classes.
